abstract: Hundreds of taxi drivers march through Mexico City chanting 'Uber Out!' and demanding that city authorities ban the online ride service.
lead_paragraph: Hundreds of taxi drivers marched through Mexico City on Monday chanting “Uber Out!” and demanding that city authorities ban the online ride service.

headline.main: Cabbies in Mexico City March Against Uber Ride Service
headline.print_headline: Cabbies in Mexico City March Against Uber Ride Service

snippet: Hundreds of taxi drivers marched through Mexico City on Monday chanting “Uber Out!” and demanding that city authorities ban the online ride service.
